top_categories.workout_context: 85ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
At Carpathian Gravel, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
Carpathian Gravel's Carpathian Mountains, Mountainous gravel forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 65 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Carpathian Gravel's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before July.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Carpathian Gravel. Train it until it feels boring.
5,500ft of climbing means repeated surges above threshold. VO2max work is how you survive the fifth climb, not just the first.
5,500ft of climbing on grades that change every minute. You need to switch from seated to standing without losing rhythm.
65 miles on carpathian mountainous gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
Low-cadence force work for 5,500ft of climbing. The slow, grinding ascents where you can't spin—you push.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Carpathian Gravel, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
Short, max efforts are unavoidable. Punchy climbs, gap closures, attacks on carpathian mountainous gravel. If you haven't trained them, you'll crack.
Double-threshold training builds sustained power with less fatigue. More FTP per hour of training.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Carpathian Gravel’s 65 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.altitude: Moderate altitude at Carpathian Gravel. Arrive 2–3 days early. Reduce intensity expectations by 5–10%. Hydrate aggressively.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Carpathian Gravel requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on carpathian mountainous gravel to build confidence. Expect: carpathian mountains, mountainous gravel, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Over Under, and Gravel Specific to prepare you for 65 miles of carpathian mountainous gravel in Carpathian Mountains, Romania.
